alert.note: Alert for Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 10:30AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Bay, southeastern Walton and southwestern Washington Counties through 1115 AM EDT/1015 AM CDT/... At 1029 AM EDT/929 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a waterspout and wind gusts over 40 mph along a line extending from 9 miles southeast of Santa Rosa Beach to 9 miles west of Panama City Beach to 23 miles southwest of Panama City. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Waterspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally hazardous waters. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Ebro, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Seminole Hills, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, Bayou George, West Panama City, Seaside, Bahama Beach, Biltmore Beach and Sunnyside. WATERSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Walton; Coastal Bay; Inland Bay; South Walton; Washington
